profile.delete_account_description: If you choose to delete your account, it will NOT be recoverable. All information regarding your account, including settings, rooms, and recordings will be removed.
profile.delete_account_confirmation: Yes, I would like to delete my account

meeting.meeting_invitation: You have been invited to join
meeting.meeting_not_started: The meeting has not started yet
meeting.join_meeting_automatically: You will automatically join when the meeting starts

presentation.upload_description: Upload any office document or PDF file. Depending on the size of the file, it may require additional time to upload before it can be used

shared_access.add_some_users_description: To add new users, click the button below and search or select the users you want to share this room with.

settings.allow_any_user_to_start: Allow any user to start this meeting

administration.change_term_links: Change the terms links that appears at the bottom of the page
administration.change_privacy_link: Change the privacy link that appears at the bottom of the page

settings.allow_users_to_share_rooms_description: Setting to disabled will remove the button from the room options dropdown, preventing users from sharing rooms
settings.allow_users_to_preupload_presentation_de: Users can preupload a presentation to be used as the default presentation for that specific room

registration.role_mapping_by_email_description: Map the user to a role using their email. Must be in the format: role1=email1, role2=email2

configurations.allow_room_to_be_recorded_description: Allows room owners to specify whether they want the option to record a room or not. If enabled, the moderator must still click the â€œRecord button once the meeting has started.
configurations.require_user_signed_in: Require users to be signed in before joining
configurations.require_user_signed_in_description: Only allows users with a Greenlight account to join the meeting. If they are not signed in, they will be redirected to the login page when attempting to join a room.
configurations.require_mod_approval_description: Prompts the moderator of the BigBlueButton meeting when a user tries to join. If the user is approved, they will be able to join the meeting.
configurations.allow_any_user_to_start_meeting: Allow any user to start a meeting
configurations.allow_any_user_to_start_meeting_descript: Allow any user to start the meeting at any time. By default, only the room owner can start the meeting.
configurations.allow_users_to_join_as_mods: Allow users to join as moderators
configurations.allow_users_to_join_as_mods_description: Gives all users the moderator privileges in BigBlueButton when they join the meeting
configurations.mute_users_on_join_description: Automatically mutes the user when they join the BigBlueButtonMeeting
configurations.viewer_access_code_description: Allows room owners to have a random alphanumeric code that can be shared with users. The code, if generated, will be required for users to join the room meetings.
configurations.mod_access_code_description: Allows room owners to have a random alphanumeric code that can be shared with users. The code, if generated, will not be required and when used on any room meeting will join the user as a moderator.
